price: 21. Kaadu Qhuraan keenil yankirriyime waqdi, Yallah kah kummaate waanaah kah rammite waanam macalon?
arabic: وَإِذَا قُرِئَ عَلَيۡهِمُ ٱلۡقُرۡءَانُ لَا يَسۡجُدُونَۤ۩

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: wa-idhā quri-a ʿalayhimu al-qur'ānu lā yasjudūna
